eef0462cd417a5f937ff9ec6aa34f1499a811574.task: Add the holidays of China to the calendar
eef0462cd417a5f937ff9ec6aa34f1499a811574.similar: Task: Add holidays for China to the calendar.
eef0462cd417a5f937ff9ec6aa34f1499a811574.path:
Click on <button text='More options'></button>
Click on <button>Add holidays</button>
Check <checkbox checked=False>China</checkbox>

295bcdc418b1cc7f9f6359fcfda6096a0a80abcd.similar: Task: Disable the display of week numbers on the calendar.
295bcdc418b1cc7f9f6359fcfda6096a0a80abcd.path:
Click on <button text='More options'></button>
Click on <button>Settings</button>
Check <checkbox checked=False>Show week numbers OFF</checkbox>

19c51276c1302fc90f7dcb004bb49dab4cb43588.task: change the event type 'regular event' to 'deadlines'
19c51276c1302fc90f7dcb004bb49dab4cb43588.similar: Task: Cancel a regular event in the calendar and make changes to the event title, type, and color.
19c51276c1302fc90f7dcb004bb49dab4cb43588.path:
Click on <button text='More options'></button>
Click on <button>Settings</button>
Click on <button>Manage event types</button>
Click on <button>Regular event</button>
Click on <button>CANCEL</button>

accffc404ccc6f395130ddc325f4ca34b7b7da50.task: add all my contacts' birthdays into the calendar
accffc404ccc6f395130ddc325f4ca34b7b7da50.similar: task: add birthdays of contacts to the calendar.
accffc404ccc6f395130ddc325f4ca34b7b7da50.path:
Click on <button text='More options'></button>
Click on <button>Add contact birthdays</button>
